cause.description:
Everyone knows my old 94 grandam is gehetto! And that is it going down the tubes to be known as a junker. Engine problems everyweek etc etc So I have issued this preemptive strike! If everyone on facebook donates 75 cents, (everyone meaning everysingle member) I can get a AUDI A4! So help a brother out Thanks
Probably will end up getting a used honda the A4 was a joke, All extra money will be donated to a local homeless shelter
1. Get me a car that might actually last 6 years
2. So that i can visit my family when i go to college
3. and have a reliable source of transportation
cause.name: Matt Yales New Car Fund
